name: Wangan Warrior X
detailed_description:
Wangan Warrior X is a modernized realistic take on street-racing games that were only available in cabinets at arcades. Players can customize and tune their car with a wide variety of options and parts. Once you're ready to roll, take your ride through highways at speeds up to 200 MPH/320 KMH on different levels of Japan's highway systems against rivals of all kinds at daytime and nighttime. As you work your way up you can unlock more parts, rewards, paintjobs, and more.

Become a Wangan Warrior today!

short_description: Wangan Warrior X is a modernized realistic take on street-racing games that were only available in cabinets at arcades. Players can customize and tune their car with a wide variety of options and parts.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD, Radeon HD)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirextX 9 is not supported, OpenGL Core is used as a replacement for lower end hardware.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770
  • Memory: 4092 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
